definition: Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the 57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片獲第57屆柏林電影節最佳影片金熊獎。

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片獲第57屆柏林電影節最佳影片金熊獎。

sentences.english: "Honey" won Golden Bear award in Berlin International Film Festival successfully.
sentences.chinese: 《蜂蜜》柏林電影節爆冷成功擒金熊獎。

sentences.english: Nominated the Golden Berlin Bear in Berlin International Film Festival 2008.
sentences.chinese: 本片榮獲2008年柏林國際電影節金熊獎提名。
